title: Participation for all (TEFC)
creator_credit: Ian Andrews and Burbank Audio Visual
brief_description: Describes an elementary school program for all grade levels, how to develop student leadership, and ways of modifying a variety of indoor and outdoor activities to maximise the use of all available space and equipment.
